name: Cracks
description:
Summary

Cracks is a short narrative game initially made for the LD40 Compo. I needed more time in the end so I entered it for the Jam. So it was made with all the rules of the Compo but with 72 hours. I love having to create a story or narrative for my games but I can't say much about this one without spoiling it. I hope you enjoy!

Controls

You'll only need you're mouse movement and its left click button to move and use the tools.

Things I didn’t have time to finish and would be nice to add once the voting period is over

  • Sound effects
  • Tool animations
  • Visual feedbacks (Mainly particles)

Tools

  • Unity
  • Some ink and water color.
  • Gimp
  • Bosca Ceoil
